  • Uses of Action in game.actions

    Subclasses of Action in game.actions
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    class  ActivateBonfireAction
    Activate Bonfire Action when the Player is first time interact with the Bonfire.
    class  AttackAction
    Special Action for attacking other Actors.
    class  BlockAttackPathAction
    Block Attack Path Action if there is a wall within the attack path when Actor is attacking.
    class  BonfireTeleportAction
    Bonfire Teleport Action when Actor is interacting with Bonfire (Must have TELEPORT Abilities).
    class  BurnGroundAction
    Burn Ground Action when the Actor is holding the weapon of Yhorms Great Machete (Active skill).
    class  BuyMenuAction
    Buy Menu Action when the Player enter to buy from Vendor.
    class  BuyWeaponAction
    Buy Weapon Action for Player when entered Purchase Action.
    class  ChargeAction
    Charge Action for Storm Ruler weapon.
    class  EnemyDeathAction
    Enemy Death Action for Enemy like Skeleton and Undead (Not for boss).
    class  ExitBuyMenuAction
    Exit Buy Menu Action when the Player want to exit the Purchase Action.
    class  IncreaseHPAction
    Increase HP Action for Player to purchase from the Vendor.
    class  KillPlayerAction
    Kill PLayer Action when the player has a die Action.
    class  LordOfCinderDeathAction
    Lord of Cinder Death Action for Lord of Cinder (boss).
    class  OpenChestAction
    Open Chest Action for Actor that has Ability of OPEN_CHEST.
    class  PickUpWeaponAction
    Action to allow weapon items to be picked up.
    class  PurchaseAction
    Purchase Action for PLayer.
    class  SpinAttackAction
    Spin Attack Action for Giant Axe weapon.
    class  StunnedAction
    Stunned Action for the Enemy (boss).
    class  SwapWeaponAction
    An action to swap weapon (new weapon replaces old weapon).
    class  TradeCinderOfLordAction
    Trade Cinder of Lord Action for Player to trade a weapon from Vendor.
    class  UseBonfireAction
    Use Bonfire Action for the Player.
    class  UseEstusFlaskAction
    Use Estus Flask Action for the Player to drink Estus Flask.
    class  UseFogDoorAction
    Use Fog Door Action for the Player to move to another map.
    class  ValleyDeathAction
    Valley Death Action for the Player when he jumps into the Valley.
    class  WindSlashAction
    Wind Slash Action for Storm Ruler weapon.

  • Uses of Action in game.behaviours

    Subclasses of Action in game.behaviours
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    class  EmberFormBehaviour
    Ember Form Behaviour acts as an Action and a Behaviour that will execute some actions that make the YhormTheGiant become stronger (Ember Form).
    class  RandomDieBehaviour
    Random Die Behaviour acts as an Action and a Behaviour that Undead will die random every turn.
    class  RangeAttackBehaviour
    RangeAttackBehaviour (Action) that acts as an Action for Player but a behaviour of Enemy which can attack Actor within 3-square away.
    class  WanderBehaviour
    Wander Behaviour that will make enemies to move around.
